question: Is it correct that for isal-e-sawab of parents if children recite kalima 100000 times than the maghfirat of the deceased is inevitable.
answer:
QUESTION
Kindly inform if there is any wazifa through which the deceased is given maghfirat.
ANSWER


Share:
There is no Wazifa or Kalimah that guarantees the Maghfirat of the deceased. It is all left up to the wish and choice of Allah Ta?ala.

The heirs and family members of the deceased should make as much Tilaawat of the Qur?aan, Sadaqah, Dhikr, Du?aa and Maghrifat for the deceased. Insha Allah, the deceased will be forgiven.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
